backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining storage mixins, access control, user profiles, and CRUD logic for equipment-related entities with permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries of various frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions specifying color tokens and styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root div and main TypeScript application module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes with TanStack Router and wrapping UI with theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/AccessControlIni: Empty placeholder component file for an access-control initialization banner.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmDialog.ts: Reusable confirmation dialog component using shadcn AlertDialog for confirm/cancel prompts.
Dropdown component that fetches and lists equipment for selection using query hook data.
Reusable form field wrapper with label, required indicator, help text, and error display.
frontend/src/components/PageLayout.tsx: Shared layout component providing header, main content container, and footer with app branding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that initializes and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state and login flow using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for equipment, spare parts, cataloguing, maintenance, and document operations via an actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/cataloguingTemplates.ts: Exports predefined cataloguing templates and a function to retrieve fields by template name.
frontend/src/lib/dates.ts: Utility functions for converting bigint timestamps to readable dates and vice versa.
frontend/src/lib/errors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into user-friendly messages and detects authentication-related errors.
frontend/src/lib/exports.ts: Provides CSV and lightweight PDF export utilities for tabular data.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Simple form validation utilities for required fields, numbers, and email formats.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CataloguingPage.tsx: Implements cataloguing record creation, editing, and deletion with template-based attributes and backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentsPage.tsx: UI for uploading, listing, editing, and deleting equipment documents with progress tracking and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentListPage.tsx: Displays all equipment with edit/delete dialogs and supports updating and removing equipment records.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentMasterPage.t: Form for creating new equipment records with authentication checks and validation.
frontend/src/pages/MaintenancePage.tsx: Manages creation, viewing, editing, and deletion of maintenance records tied to selected equipment.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Generates equipment, spare parts, and maintenance reports with CSV/PDF export options.
frontend/src/pages/SparePartsPage.tsx: React page for viewing, creating, editing, and deleting spare parts tied to selected equipment, with form handling and dialogs. Uses custom query hooks and toast notifications for async mutations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading and persisting URL parameters, including support for hash-based routing and sessionStorage-backed persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current issues, existing features, and requirements focused on fixing equipment creation failures and improving authorization error handling.
